name: INELO Polska Spółka z ograniczoną odpowiedzialnością
membership: The Confederation of Organisations in Road Transport Enforcement (CORTE) - http://www.corte.be/
goal: INELO - a leading European company which specializes in production, distribution and development of the top quality software for driver's working time analysis and accounting for transportation industry and control authorities.
